API Documentation¶

lblcrn.help()¶

Helps you.

lblcrn.echo_on()¶

Turn on echo.

lblcrn.echo_off()¶

Turn off echo.

lblcrn.docs()¶

Opens the docs in your web browser.

Utility for packaged examples.

Exports:

list_all() print_all() load(name: str)

Usage:

list all of the example with print_all():

print_all()
> Example 'predator-prey' (type RxnSystem)

Then load one of them:

rsys = load('predator-prey')

LBL CRN
